mean_cn: v. 使地方化，（使）局部化，停留在一地方
mean_en: to keep (something) within a limited area :to prevent the spread of (something)
word_etyma:
loc 地方 + al...的 + ize ...化 → vt. 使地方化；使局部化；停留在一地方
vi. 局部化；集中
sentence: We managed to localize the cell phone outage to a small area outside Belgrade.
sentence_trans: 手机没电之前，我们成功定位到贝尔格莱德外小范围内。
